TextView.android:text: \t\tNote: These are short descriptions of rituals commonly known in-game. Additional rituals exist but you must discover them in game. Many rituals have additional powers beyond those listed in summary!
A ritual circle that does not count against the caster’s ritual circle cap.
If this ink is used on sigil BM it will x2 the numerical amount or double the duration.
Allows a 10-word message to be sent to a predetermined person or place.
This circle augment grants the ability to create a 1/ever trigger for when someone does, says or is something specific within the circle.
Creates ink that removes the need to redraw sigils.
Creates a magic symbol that acts as a trap with specific conditions, stores battle magic spells.
1/ever contingency 'spell' when the target sees an object or thing.
A chain that causes a trigger to activate on specific people, races or anyone but a specific name.
Increases duration of sigil rituals by +3 months.
Causes the target to glow after triggering a sigil circle.
Allows triggers to be rearmed x/day.
Allows 1 trigger to cast up to 5 battle magic spells.
1/ever contingency 'spell' on strike or struck effects.
If this ink is used on sigil BM it will grant 1 of 4 different additional abilities based on the gem used. Offense/Defense/Healing/Damage Reduction.
A magical pocket that persists through resurrection and the items within cannot be detected.
Chain: Adds an Area of Effect.
Replaces a battle magic trigger with either 50 elemental, 50 acid, 25 infliction, 25 healing or 100 magic damage.
Causes a circle to trigger twice.
Allows your weapon to be stored within a tattoo of equal size.
Allows the substitute of BM with trapping the target inside the circle.
Enchants a piece of chalk that can draw a doorway in any physical or magical barrier.
1/ever contingency 'spell' upon bleed, death or unconsciousness.
Creates a special sigil writing instrument. Spirit linked and allows the caster the ability to cover their sigils. Also allows them to sigil their possessions instead of skin.
Adds 1 year to the duration of Sigil rituals.
Triggers now allow ritual magic and function as if the target was in the circle during the ritual casting.
All glyphs within the circle no longer need to be repped with drawings, only tags.
Allows any trigger you can think of, with marshal approval.
Enchants a piece of chalk which can then draw a portal home to the ritual circle.
Creates a 1/ever contingency with 3 spells when a 3-word phrase is spoken.
Turns 1/ever Sigil ritual effects into 1/day effects.
Replaces a BM trigger with ritual-level destruction and death effects inside the circle.
Rearms all triggers 1/day automatically at reset.
Grants stored battle magic spells the ritual prefix.
If this ink is used on sigil battle magic it will grant 1 of 4 different additional abilities based on the blood used – demonic, fae, wormwood or spirit.
Triggers a ritual level dispel magic on all non-investees and items not on investees.
If this ink is used on sigil battle magic it will increase duration from 1 hr to 5 days, grants x5 damage/healing/reduction, and many other powers dependant on the sigil drawn.
1/ever contingency that grants multiple powers based on the creature chosen: Basilisk, Diamond Golem, Kamataichi or Bukavac.
A painting that can store 10 items and can trap a person if you know their true name.
Turns a Sigil ritual circle into a hoop for easy transport.
